ğŸš€This week a combination of new airports and scenery enhancements have landed in the marketplace. Including several items which can be rented first before you buy them. Most airports are developed by known developers such as ORBX and MSFSceneryBuilders but there are also some new airport from new developers including Simnord's Billund Airport.
In addition to this some light enhancements have been added and replacements for all vehicles around the world and a package to add solar farms.
